scripts.dev:car-components: cross-env CUSTOM_ENV=car-components node scripts/prepare-env.js && concurrently "cross-env CUSTOM_ENV=car-components npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.dev:another-customer: cross-env CUSTOM_ENV=another-customer node scripts/prepare-env.js && concurrently "cross-env CUSTOM_ENV=another-customer npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.tauri:key: powershell -Command "$env:TAURI_SIGNING_PRIVATE_KEY = Get-Content -Raw '.\src-tauri\~\.tauri\myapp.key'; npm run tauri build -- --debug "
scripts.tauri:build:car-components: cross-env CUSTOM_ENV=car-components node scripts/prepare-env.js && cross-env CUSTOM_ENV=car-components node scripts/update-tauri-config.js && cross-env CUSTOM_ENV=car-components npm run build:client && tauri build
scripts.tauri:build:another-customer: cross-env CUSTOM_ENV=another-customer node scripts/prepare-env.js && cross-env CUSTOM_ENV=another-customer node scripts/update-tauri-config.js && cross-env CUSTOM_ENV=another-customer npm run build:client && tauri build
scripts.tauri:prod: npm run server:pkg && npm run tauri:build
